dcterms:description: A small dataset containing news articles used to train temporal word embeddings, divided into yearly time slices.
dcterms:title: News Article Corpus Small (NAC-S)

dcterms:description: A large dataset containing news articles from the New York Times, used to train temporal word embeddings, divided into yearly time slices.
dcterms:title: News Article Corpus Large (NAC-L)

dcterms:description: A test set composed of temporal word analogies based on publicly recorded knowledge, partitioned in categories.
dcterms:title: Testset1 (T1)

dcterms:description: A test set composed of temporal word analogies based on publicly recorded knowledge, partitioned in categories.
dcterms:title: Testset2 (T2)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing the full text from all machine learning papers published on the ArXiv between April 2007 and June 2015, used to train temporal word embeddings.
dcterms:title: Machine Learning Papers Corpus (MLPC)
